official-title.#text:
To amend the DNA Analysis Backlog Elimination Act of 2000
		  to provide for Debbie Smith grants for auditing sexual assault evidence
		  backlogs and to establish a Sexual Assault Forensic Evidence Reporting System,
		  and for other purposes.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the
cosponsor.#text:
Mrs. Carolyn B. Maloney of New
			 York

term.#tail: means, with respect to a sample of sexual assault evidence, that—

the sample has been collected and is in the
